Tony wrote:

Osaka, in 1615, the winter/summer campaign to reduce
the castle.

But you're probably thinking of the big battle of
Sekigahara in October 
of 1600.

Thanx! thats it, its one of those names that is hard
to remember. hah, most japanese names are hard to
remember and i've gotta remember a load of them for my asessment.
